# isFileExtensionHidden

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the file extension should appear after the filename.

## Declaration

```swift
var isFileExtensionHidden: Bool { get set }
```

## Specifying PDF Information

- **url**: The URL identifying the location at which the PDF file will be created.
- **tagNames**: An array of tag names that should be applied to the PDF file after it’s created.
- **orientation**: The paper orientation to use when exporting content as a PDF file.
- **paperSize**: The paper size to use when exporting content as a PDF file.
- **attributes**: A dictionary of additional attributes that describe how to export content as a PDF file.
